PutFile access token used: User A, since User B is not editing.
Additional notes: After no more than 5 minutes, Word for the web will call CheckFileInfo with User B's access token. That call will indicate that User B no longer has edit permissions, so User B will be removed from the editing session. User A can continue editing the document.

Once User B's edit permission is removed, all PutFile requests for the session will fail. In no more than 3 minutes after the first PutFile failure, then all users, including User A, will be removed from the editing session.
